channel.title: I need iTouch help
channel.description: ok so i jailbroke my itouch and got cydia it is firmware 3.1.2 and i was wundering how i would get installer other than from a file because i dled it from a file and it didnt work im doing this so i can runa server on my itouch and i was also wundering how i would run a source on itouch(i mean get it on itouch)

item.title: I need iTouch help
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

mylust4blood:

jailbroken itouch lowers ur RAM on ur itouch. (itouches do not have a listed RAM, most experts believe its 500mb-1gb (1024mb) of RAM

stfu, Ipod touches use flash memory

Read full topic

item.title: I need iTouch help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:11, topic:325487”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=421806.msg3097959#msg3097959 date=1263505978]

Did my method work? I’m curious.

no cuz i wanted installer not installous(cydia.hackulo.us) cuz when i jailbroke it w/black ra1n it only gave me cydia and rock

I prefer downloading the .API extension files and transferring them to my iTouch via WinSCP.
[/quote]
i did that but installer when in transfered didnt transfer right and got screwed up(4uck!!)[/quote]
If you want to use the WinSCP method, you need OpenSSH.

item.title: I need iTouch help
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:5, topic:325487”][quote author=imsokool22 link=topic=421806.msg3097261#msg3097261 date=1263435203]

well first you need a vps if you want to run a server (technically) on an itouch, i know there are some VPS viewing client for a itouch/iphone, also, itouches don’t have the RAM to run a server, look at itouches that crash on the simplies apps? and having a jailbroken itouch lowers ur RAM on ur itouch. (itouches do not have a listed RAM, most experts believe its 500mb-1gb (1024mb) of RAM

thanks for spamming my post

Edit:thansk for no help gtfo
[/quote]Are you incapable of understanding that he is trying to help?[/quote]
yes i am are you cappable of reading his post right(he gave me no help just some info which im not believing)

Read full topic

item.title: I need iTouch help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I jailbroke mine about a month ago.

Cydia - Manage - Sources - Edit - Add - http://cydia.hackulo.us/

It should be added to the list of source. Go into it, and check ‘Installer’.

I prefer downloading the .API extension files and transferring them to my iTouch via WinSCP. Installer is slow and shitty.

Read full topic
